1: Each Town destroys 1 Explorer in its land.
3: Destroy all Explorer in lands with Town / City. Each City destroys 1 Town in its land.
2: Each Town destroys 1 Explorer in its land. Each City destroys 2 Explorer in its land.
name: Scapegoats

1: In each land, Defend 1 per Dahan.
3: In each land, Defend 2 per Dahan.
2: In each land with Dahan, Defend 1, plus an additional Defend 1 per Dahan.
name: Dahan on their Guard

1: Defend 2 in all lands with Presence.
3: Each player chooses a differend land and removes up to 2 Health worth of Invaders per Presence there.
2: Defend 2 in all lands with Presence. Each Spirit gains 1 Energy per SacredSite they have in lands with Invaders.
name: Belief Takes Root

1: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from a land where it is the only Invader.
3: Each player removes an Invader from a land with 2 or fewer Invaders.
2: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from a land with 2 or fewer Invaders.
name: Isolation

1: Each player removes 1 Explorer from a land with Dahan.
3: Remove 2 Explorer or 1 Town from each land with Dahan. Then, remove 1 City from each land with at least 2 Dahan.
2: Each player removes 2 Explorer or 1 Town from a land with Dahan.
name: Tall Tales of Savagery

1: Invaders do not Build in lands with City.
3: Each player may replace 1 City with 1 Town or 1 Town with 1 Explorer in a Coastal land.
2: Each player may replace 1 Town with 1 Explorer in a Coastal land.
name: Trade Suffers

1: Each player chooses a differend land with Dahan. 1 Damage there.
3: Each player chooses a differend land with Dahan. 2 Damage per Dahan there.
2: Each player chooses a differend land with Dahan. 1 Damage per Dahan there.
name: Dahan Raid

1: Invaders do not Explore into lands with at least 2 Dahan.
3: Invaders do not Build in lands with Dahan.
2: Invaders do not Build in lands where Dahan outnumber Town / City.
name: Avoid the Dahan

1: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from a land with SacredSite.
3: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from a land with Presence, or 1 City from a land with SacredSite.
2: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from a land with Presence.
name: Fear of the Unseen

1: Each player may Push up to 2 Explorer from an Inland land.
3: Each player may Push any number of Explorer / Town from one land.
2: Each player may Push up to 3 Explorer / Town from an Inland land.
name: Retreat!

3: Defend 9 in all Coastal lands. Invaders do not Build in Coastal lands this turn.
2: Defend 6 in all Coastal lands. Invaders do not Build City in Coastal lands this turn.
name: Overseas Trade Seems Safer

1: Each player removes 1 Explorer from a Coastal land.
3: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from any land.
2: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from a Coastal land.
name: Emigration Accelerates

1: Each player removes 1 Explorer from an Inland land.
3: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from any land.
2: Each player removes 1 Explorer / Town from an Inland land.
name: Wary of the Interior

1: Each player may Push 1 Dahan from a land with Invaders or Gather 1 Dahan into a land with Invaders.
3: Each player chooses a differend land. In chosen lands: Gather up to 2 Dahan, then 1 Damage per Dahan present.
2: Eac hplayer chooses a differend land. In chosen lands: Gather up to 2 Dahan, then 1 Damage if Dahan are present.
name: Dahan Enheartened

1: Each player may Push 1 Explorer into a land with more Town / City than the land it came from.
3: Each player may remove up to 3 Health worth of Invaders from a land without Town.
2: Each player may Gather 1 Explorer into a land with Town / City, or Gather 1 Town into a land with City.
name: Seek Safety
